title: Yandex : annual revenue 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion Russian rubles, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion Russian rubles has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion Russian rubles is roughly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Revenue in billion Russian rubles, about 175.39 was reported at Year 2019
Minimum Revenue in billion Russian rubles about 4.25 was reached at Year 2007

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion Russian rubles, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion Russian rubles has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion Russian rubles is roughly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Revenue in billion Russian rubles, about 175.39 was reported at Year 2019

The line rapidly increased by 80.0% from Year 2007 to 2008.
